it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.toolcards

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.toolcards.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ToolCard
extends Card
    Tool Card class The tool card class that extends the basic card
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Action> actionToPerform 
      private int anotherMoveDice 
      private java.lang.String choseColorFromRoundrack 
      private java.lang.String color
      Color of the ToolCard
      private int favorToken
      Favor token currently placed on the ToolCard At the beginning there a 0 on it
      private java.util.ArrayList<Position> moveDiceFinalPositions
      This arraylist is used to contain all the move action positions when they are used in combination It is also used to check if the player is not trying to move 2 dice in the same position at the end
      private java.util.ArrayList<Position> moveDiceStartingPositions
      This arraylist is used to contain all the move starting action positions In that way it is possible to avoid that the player will try to place 2 dices starting from the same position
      private int number
      Number of the ToolCard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Action> getActionToPerform()
      Getter userd to retrieve all the actions in the action list of the ToolCard In that way is possibile to parse them and execute the in oder to complete the ToolCard effect
      int getAnotherMoveDice()
      Getter of the anotherMoveDice parameter to know if the player wants to set anotherMoveDice dice after the first one
      java.lang.String getChoseColorFromRoundrack()
      Getter to retrieve the string of the color chosen from the roundrack from a previous move

      Getter used to retrieve the color of the ToolCard
      int getFavorToken()
      Getter used to retrieve the amount of token placed on the ToolCard
      int getFavorTokenNeeded()
      Method used to return the amount of tokens needed to use this ToolCard
      java.util.ArrayList<Position> getMoveDiceFinalPositions()
      Getter of the final position array The array is used to check if the user by mistake is not trying to put in the same place 2 dices when making a combined action
      java.util.ArrayList<Position> getMoveDiceStartingPositions()
      Getter of the starting position array The array is used to check if the user by mistak is not trying to place 2 dices both starting from the same position
      int getNumber()
      Getter to retrieve the value of the number of the ToolCard

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the card (passed up via super)
        number - Number of the card
        color - Color of the card
        description - Description of the card (passed up via super)
